trans-unit.source: Register your mobile service with the Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Register your mobile service with the Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: In this section you will register your mobile service with the Azure Active Directory and configure permissions to allow single sign-on impersonation.
trans-unit.target: In this section you will register your mobile service with the Azure Active Directory and configure permissions to allow single sign-on impersonation.

trans-unit.source: Register your application with your Azure Active Directory by following the [How to Register with the Azure Active Directory] topic.
trans-unit.target: Register your application with your Azure Active Directory by following the [How to Register with the Azure Active Directory] topic.

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure Management Portal], go back to the Azure Active Directory extension and click on your active directory
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure Management Portal], go back to the Azure Active Directory extension and click on your active directory

trans-unit.source: Click the **Applications** tab and then click your application.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Applications** tab and then click your application.

trans-unit.source: Then click **Download Manifest** and save the application manifest to a local directory.
trans-unit.target: Then click **Download Manifest** and save the application manifest to a local directory.

trans-unit.source: Open the application manifest file with Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Open the application manifest file with Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: At the top of the file find the app permissions line that looks as follows:
trans-unit.target: At the top of the file find the app permissions line that looks as follows:

trans-unit.source: Replace that line with the following app permissions and save the file.
trans-unit.target: Replace that line with the following app permissions and save the file.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management portal, click **Manage Manifest** for the application again and click **Upload Manifest**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management portal, click **Manage Manifest** for the application again and click **Upload Manifest**.

trans-unit.source: Browse to the location of the application manifest that you just updated and upload the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Browse to the location of the application manifest that you just updated and upload the manifest.
